name: Sapling - UE4 Spring 2018
description:
This game was made within the 5 day period of the Unreal Engine Spring 2018 Game Jam hosted by Epic Games.

The team was comprised of 5 people. Myself, 3 UCSD students, and a friend of one of the students.

Goal: Protect the sapling from adverse weather conditions

Player Controls

Movement: WASD

Shoot Fireball: Left Click

PickUp/Drop Items: Right Click

Quit: Alt+F4

Hints:

The Sapling requires water, soil, and protection

Water and soil can be picked up and brought to the Sapling. When the Sapling is healthy, it well regenerate and grow.

Blocks in the outskirts can be pickuped and dropped to block the wind

Bugs can be killed by shooting them with fireballs
